title: Why We May Never See Lunchbox Again… + We Name the ‘Perfect’ Movie + Easy Trivia Championship Edition
itunes:title: Why We May Never See Lunchbox Again… + We Name the ‘Perfect’ Movie + Easy Trivia Championship Edition
description:
Lunchbox tells us that he must leave the show today to head into jury duty...we think we may never see him again because he really wants to get picked. He reveals his plan. Everyone from the show suggests what they think is the ‘perfect’ movie from start to finish. Since Lunchbox is leaving, we get in a round of Easy Trivia where the championship is on the line!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
